English: The prisoner is wielding a melee weapon
Description: A description of a condition, i.e. the subject must have their "melee weapon equipped" for the condition to be met.

Italian.Translation: Il prigioniero impugna un'arma da mischia

Spanish.Translation: El prisionero lleva un arma cuerpo a cuerpo

Russian.Translation: Заключенный должен использовать оружие ближнего боя.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Está empunhando uma arma de golpe

Polish.Translation: Biorca trzyma broń do walki wręcz.

Japanese.Translation: 囚人が近接武器を使用している

name: BoosterImplants.Conditions.IsWieldingMeleeDescription
